author: Press
title: Dhofar Global conferred with Platinum Technology Award for QualityBest Trade Name 2015
text:
(MENAFN Press) UAE, August 31, 2015 “ Dhofar Global, a leading supplier of hygiene care products in the Middle East, has won the Platinum Technology Award for Quality & Best Trade Name 2015 in recognition of its outstanding achievements in quality and business excellence. Charbel S. Tabet, President and CEO, Otherways Management & Consulting (OMAC), presented the prestigious award to Faleh Al Abri, Group Chief Executive Officer, Dhofar Global, and Chandan Singh, Group Chief Operations Officer of Dhofar Global during a gala award ceremony held recently in Rome, Italy. In addition to receiving the award, the company was also conferred with a TQM Certificate.

The winning of the award by Dhofar Global demonstrates the company's successful implementation of Total Quality Management (TQM) in providing world-class hygiene care solutions to customers. The company strictly follows the eight elements of ethics, integrity, trust, training, teamwork, leadership, recognition and communication to ensure successful TQM. In addition, Dhofar Global strongly believes in keeping pace with technological innovation while maintaining high standards in quality to achieve institutional excellence in all levels. 

On receiving the award, Singh said: "It gives us great pleasure to receive the distinguished Platinum Technology Award for Quality & Best Trade Name from OMAC. The award recognizes our efforts to successfully implement TQM which empowers us to follow international best practices while providing high quality products to our customers. Rest assured, we remain committed to follow a robust customer-centric approach with an aim to deliver complete satisfaction to our patrons." 

The Platinum Technology Award for Quality & Best Trade Name is bestowed to exceptional companies and organizations from varied industries across Europe, America, Asia, Africa and the Middle East for their consistent and outstanding efforts and achievements in the area of quality and business excellence. Dhofar Global is the recipient of several awards, including Otherways Global Award for Perfection, Quality and Ideal Performance 2015; SME “ Excellence in Trade 2014; and 'Best Green Investment Project' at the Arab Investment Summit 2011, 2012, and 2013.


About Dhofar 
Dhofar Global Tr. Co. LLC., is a hygiene care product company in the Middle East that strives to utilize the latest technology to deliver innovative products. Established in 2001, the company specializes in high quality, competitively priced products such as Tissues and Micro Fiber Cloth, Air Fresheners & Hand Dryers, Aluminum Foil & Cling Film, Dispenser & Garbage Bag, and Soaps & Chemicals, among others. The company has been the region's leading supplier to 4- and 5-star hotels, multi-national corporations, banking sectors, ministries, private sectors organizations and Facility Management companies. Dhofar Global opened its first office in the UAE in 2007 in Sharjah to concentrate on the country's huge market. Since then, it has opened two warehouses in Dubai and Sharjah and has expanded to other countries like Qatar (Doha) and Oman. In addition, the company also maintains key business interests in other parts of the region.
